subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Five All-Stars in 2006, three N.B.A. finals in the last four seasons, two N.B.A. coaches of the year. And that’s just for the teams in Texas.
snippet: Five All-Stars in 2006, three N.B.A. finals in the last four seasons, two N.B.A. coaches of the year. And that’s just for the teams in Texas.
